ARABIC: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or do they have some god other than Allah? Glory be to Allah above any idol they propose!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or do they have a god apart from God? He is too exalted for what they associate with Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they have any god other than Allah? Exalted be Allah above whatever they associate (with Him in His Divinity).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they have another god besides God? God is too exalted to be considered equal to the idols.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or do they have a God besides Allah? Purity is to Allah from their ascribing of partners to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or have they a god other than Allah Glorified be Allah from all that they ascribe as partners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or have they a god other than Allah? Glory be to Allah from what they set up (with Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or have they a god, other than God? Glory be to God, above that which they associate!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or have they any god beside Allah? Glorified be Allah from all that they ascribe as partner (unto Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or have they a god other than God? Exalted be God over what they ascribe as partners [to Him]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is theirs a god beside Allah? Hallowed be Allah from that which they associate!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they have any god other than Allah? Clear is Allah of any partners that they may ascribe [to Him]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or have they a god other than Allah? Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or have they an ilah (a god) other than Allah? Glorified be Allah from all that they ascribe as partners (to Him)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, do they have a god, other than Allah? Exaltations to Allah above that which they associate!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or do they have a god besides God? God transcends what they associate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:43] Or do they have a god other than God? Glory be to God [exalted is He] above any partners that they may ascribe!, to Him in the way of gods (the succession of interrogatives with am, ‘or’, are intended to express censure and rebuke).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or have they any god beside Allah) who will save them from Allah's torment? (Glorified be Allah) Allah exonerates Himself (from all that they ascribe as partner (unto Him)) of idols!
